abstract: In an interview with the Fox Business Network on Thursday, Warren Buffett said that Berkshire was still picking up the tab for the lawyers of David Sokol, the former star manager who is under investigation for insider trading.
snippet: In an interview with the Fox Business Network on Thursday, Warren Buffett said that Berkshire was still picking up the tab for the lawyers of David Sokol, the former star manager who is under investigation for insider trading.
lead_paragraph: Whatever happened to the federal investigation of David Sokol? While the status of the case is unclear, the matter apparently remains a drain on his former employer, Berkshire Hathaway.

headline.main: On Eve of Berkshire Meeting, Sokol’s Legacy Lingers
